Celeron enters the storage room, which he is now glad that he finished
rein=
forcing.  He goes to an old weapon's crate in the back and hoping
to find w=
eapons.  All he finds is an old rifle and a lot of weapons
parts.  He takes=
 the riffle, checks it to make sure it is still
funtioning, then fishes aro=
und in the crate for some more parts.  He
wasn't sure if he had time to put=
 together anything else, but he had
to try.  He hoped that Hellplague was o=
k, as she haddn't responded to
his earlier inquiry as he left the cockpit f=
or safety.  He figured she
had more important things on her mind right now,=
 like avoiding getting
shot.
